Common Operations on Matrix Objects

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/operators.R
operator.Rd

Performs common operations on DataMatrix objects.

# S4 method for DataMatrix,DataMatrix
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,matrix
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,numeric
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,logical
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,DataMatrix
Compare(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,matrix
Compare(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,numeric
Compare(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,DataMatrix
Logic(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,matrix
Logic(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,numeric
Logic(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,logical
Logic(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
Math(x)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
Math2(x, digits)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
Summary(x, ..., na.rm = FALSE)

Arguments

x, e1, e2

An object (typically a DataMatrix object).
digits

A numeric value giving number of digits to be used in round or signif.
...

Further arguments passed to or from methods.
na.rm

A logical scalar: should missing values be removed?

Group Generics

DataMatrix objects have support for S4 group generic functionality to operate within elements across objects:

Arith

"+", "-", "*", "^", "%%", "%/%", "/"

Compare

"==", ">", "<", "!=", "<=", ">="

Logic

"&", "|"

Ops

"Arith", "Compare", "Logic"

Math

"abs", "sign", "sqrt", "ceiling", "floor", "trunc", "cummax", "cummin", "cumprod", "cumsum", "log", "log10", "log2", "log1p", "acos", "acosh", "asin", "asinh", "atan", "atanh", "exp", "expm1", "cos", "cosh", "cospi", "sin", "sinh", "sinpi", "tan", "tanh", "tanpi", "gamma", "lgamma", "digamma", "trigamma"

Math2

"round", "signif"

Summary

"min", "max", "range", "prod", "sum", "any", "all"

Author

N. Frerebeau

Examples

## Create count data matrix
A <- CountMatrix(data = sample(0:10, 100, TRUE), nrow = 20, ncol = 5)
B <- CountMatrix(data = sample(0:10, 100, TRUE), nrow = 20, ncol = 5)

## Arith
A + B

#>       col1 col2 col3 col4 col5
#> row1    15   13   12   17   12
#> row2    18   11   16    5   14
#> row3     6    4   20   16    9
#> row4    10   12    8    2   17
#> row5     8    6   12    7   13
#> row6    10   10   10   10    8
#> row7     1    8    9   20   10
#> row8    11   15    8   18    8
#> row9    18    8    1   10    9
#> row10   14    2   10   12    6
#> row11    5    5   16    9    8
#> row12   15   12    9   10    4
#> row13   10   16    3   17    4
#> row14   13   11    4   18    8
#> row15   18   12    3    4    9
#> row16    2    9    9   14   17
#> row17   13    7   10    3   16
#> row18    5    5   13    7   14
#> row19    1   12   13    8   17
#> row20   10   19   12    8   13
A * 2

#>       col1 col2 col3 col4 col5
#> row1    10   20   16   20   18
#> row2    16   16   12    8   20
#> row3     6    6   20   18   12
#> row4     0   16    0    0   14
#> row5    12    0   10   12    6
#> row6     8   12   16   10    0
#> row7     0    0   16   20   18
#> row8     8   20    4   16    0
#> row9    18    6    2   16   12
#> row10   12    0   16    8    8
#> row11    4    2   12   12    0
#> row12   16   16    8   16    2
#> row13    8   18    6   18    6
#> row14    6    2    0   16   16
#> row15   20   14    6    6   12
#> row16    0    4    8   10   20
#> row17   14   12    4    0   18
#> row18    6    0   14   12   12
#> row19    2   14   10   10   16
#> row20    6   20    6   14   12
A ^ 2

#>       col1 col2 col3 col4 col5
#> row1    25  100   64  100   81
#> row2    64   64   36   16  100
#> row3     9    9  100   81   36
#> row4     0   64    0    0   49
#> row5    36    0   25   36    9
#> row6    16   36   64   25    0
#> row7     0    0   64  100   81
#> row8    16  100    4   64    0
#> row9    81    9    1   64   36
#> row10   36    0   64   16   16
#> row11    4    1   36   36    0
#> row12   64   64   16   64    1
#> row13   16   81    9   81    9
#> row14    9    1    0   64   64
#> row15  100   49    9    9   36
#> row16    0    4   16   25  100
#> row17   49   36    4    0   81
#> row18    9    0   49   36   36
#> row19    1   49   25   25   64
#> row20    9  100    9   49   36

## Compare
A == B

#>        col1  col2  col3  col4  col5
#> row1  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row2  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row3   TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE
#> row4  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row5  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE

#> row20 FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE

#>        col1 col2  col3  col4 col5
#> row1   TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row2   TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row3  FALSE TRUE FALSE  TRUE TRUE
#> row4   TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row5   TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row6   TRUE TRUE  TRUE FALSE TRUE
#> row7   TRUE TRUE  TRUE FALSE TRUE
#> row8   TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row9  FALSE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row10  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row11  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row12  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE

#> row14  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row15  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row16  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row17  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row18  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row19  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
#> row20  TRUE TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE
A > 5

#>        col1  col2  col3  col4  col5
#> row1  FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE

#> row3  FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE

#> row7  FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row8  FALSE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE
#> row9   TRUE FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row10  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE
#> row11 FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row12  TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE
#> row13 FALSE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE
#> row14 FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row15  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE  TRUE

#> row17  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE  TRUE
#> row18 FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row19 FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE  TRUE
#> row20 FALSE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE
A < 5

#>        col1  col2  col3  col4  col5
#> row1  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row2  FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE
#> row3   TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row4   TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE

## Logic
A & B

#>        col1  col2  col3  col4  col5
#> row1   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row2   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row3   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row4  FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE  TRUE
#> row5   TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row6   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row7  FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row8   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row9   TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row10  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row11  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row12  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row13  TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row14  TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE

#> row17  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE
#> row18  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row19 FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row20  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE

## Math
sqrt(A)

#>           col1     col2     col3     col4     col5
#> row1  2.236068 3.162278 2.828427 3.162278 3.000000
#> row2  2.828427 2.828427 2.449490 2.000000 3.162278
#> row3  1.732051 1.732051 3.162278 3.000000 2.449490
#> row4  0.000000 2.828427 0.000000 0.000000 2.645751
#> row5  2.449490 0.000000 2.236068 2.449490 1.732051
#> row6  2.000000 2.449490 2.828427 2.236068 0.000000
#> row7  0.000000 0.000000 2.828427 3.162278 3.000000
#> row8  2.000000 3.162278 1.414214 2.828427 0.000000
#> row9  3.000000 1.732051 1.000000 2.828427 2.449490
#> row10 2.449490 0.000000 2.828427 2.000000 2.000000
#> row11 1.414214 1.000000 2.449490 2.449490 0.000000
#> row12 2.828427 2.828427 2.000000 2.828427 1.000000
#> row13 2.000000 3.000000 1.732051 3.000000 1.732051
#> row14 1.732051 1.000000 0.000000 2.828427 2.828427
#> row15 3.162278 2.645751 1.732051 1.732051 2.449490
#> row16 0.000000 1.414214 2.000000 2.236068 3.162278
#> row17 2.645751 2.449490 1.414214 0.000000 3.000000
#> row18 1.732051 0.000000 2.645751 2.449490 2.449490
#> row19 1.000000 2.645751 2.236068 2.236068 2.828427
#> row20 1.732051 3.162278 1.732051 2.645751 2.449490

## Summary
max(A)

#> [1] 10
min(A)

#> [1] 0
range(A)

#> [1]  0 10
prod(A)

#> [1] 0
sum(A)

#> [1] 510
any(A)

#> [1] TRUE
all(A)

#> [1] FALSE
